name: Knife Dash: Hit To Crush Pizza
name_original: Knife Dash: Hit To Crush Pizza
description:
Tap the screen to launch a flying knife, dash, hit, crush the pizza and enjoy the fun of launching a flying knife and a pizza explosion. This is a game that perfectly relieves stress
Hit the oranges, unlock new flying knives, and start endless battles with pizzas. Become the best flying knife master on the leaderboard.

Game Features:
- Simple control
- 48 blades with cool design;
- 3 different game modes;
- Unique game mechanics
